name: Ultimate Spider-Man
description:
Ultimate Spider-Man is an action game developed by Vicarious Visions and Beenox Studios. It came out on 22-09-2005. Activision Blizzard published the game. Ultimate Spider-Man has a Metascore of 74, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Ultimate Spider-Man is available on PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance, PC and Nintendo DS.
It was produced by Jonathan Zamkoff. It was directed by Brian Michael Bendis and Christopher A. Busse. It was scored by Kevin Manthei.
